alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 26 at 10:59AM EST until December 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg SC has issued a Flood Warning for the French Broad River At Blantyre affecting Transylvania and Henderson Counties... ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THURSDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...French Broad River at Blantyre. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Farmland flooding continues on both sides of the river. Floodwaters impact boat access areas at Grove Bridge and Crab Creek Roads. Floodwaters may start to inundate the shoulders of River Road near the Big Willow Road intersection as the river level nears 17 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:31 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage later this afternoon to a crest of 16.5 to 16.9 feet tonight and hover in this range through Wednesday. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.5 feet on 03/02/1976. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EST.
